about_the_game:
The world is still being corrupted by chaos . After the war between chaos beings and deities, the world is returning to its natural state. Amid the consequences of this conflict, a young man full of worries begins his journey in search of a cure for his sick mother. "Sina" is a game that follows Neeve, a boy who took care of his mother from an early age, on his arduous journey through a corrupted world filled with grotesque monsters, infected environments and macabre cults.

Made by Triunfo Game Studios, "Sina" is an action-adventure game with Souls Like elements. With a great focus on its story, scenario development and fluid combat, this game provides a memorable experience for anyone who dares to challenge their fate.

Take on challenging enemies

With a fluid combat style similar to Souls Like games, "Sina" delivers challenging combat and fights against striking enemies.

Explore the World

"Sina" has a beautiful and chaotic world to explore. Find secret paths across the map, unlock shortcuts and discover the world's secrets.

Delve deeper into the story

Find story fragments and introduce yourself more and more into the daily lives of the local people who still reside in the universe of "Sina".

Future Updates:

"Sina" will have epic fights against unique bosses, along with a deep story explaining every detail of the world. We plan to introduce a skill tree that influences both the player's combos and individual skills. To expand the player's options, we plan to do 4 weapons that will be introduced to the player throughout the story. In addition to a parkour system, which allows the player to explore more and feel part of the world.
